name: Solar System Editor (Prototype)
description:
Interactive demo where a random galaxy is generated, based on random values that can influence the rotation speed and direction of planets, shape of the planets and biomes of those planets. The demo was made to test our understanding of procedural generation. All Planets can be edited individually to test the terrain generation.

 

Controls:

Right click + drag = Rotate view

Left click = Select

Scroll wheel = Zoom
